intro: Psychotria temetiuensis, commonly known as the Temetiuense Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and clusters of small, white or pale pink flowers. It contains various alkaloids, including tetrahydroprotoberberine derivatives, which have been studied for their potential pharmacological properties. Due to its habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and endangered species in its native range.
